name: Trash Craft
description:
Clean up the river and the environment & craft useful things from the trash you got out of there. Watch the nature come back to life with your help and build your new home in the woods!

Created by Viet Nhan Tran, Christina Kick, René Dominick, Dominik Tezyk, Aaron Franzen.

(We're sorry - language is German.)

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

SPACEBAR - jump

TABULATOR - inventory

CTRL - crouch

LEFT MOUSE - interact

RIGHT MOUSE - activate building mode (if you have something to build)

C - crafting menu (lower icons - craft building items; upper items - activate building mode)
